body:
As many of you know, i was suspended yesterday.
While i was bored out of my mind, i came up with a few ideas for avicus.
Some are good, some are terrible, but ima say em.

Kits

Kit wither
Casts wither effect when you hit someone
Leather armor
stone sword

Kit tank
Full iron armor
Slowness 1
Stone sword

Bring kit barbarian into cth

Kit assassin
Invisibility not able to see nametag
Iron sword

Bring scout into cth

kit satan
lava bucket
lava goes away when you die
wood sword
Full leather except for pants
Fire resistance

kit idk what to call it
Leather chestplate and pants
Stone sword
strength 1


Ideas for server

Bring Back Skywars,Elimination, And avicade.
Sumotori?
Make a survival Gamemode.
Be able to add friends ingame

Commands

/me
/msgstaffmember
/kill
/ping
/fix
/leaderboard
/mleaderboard

title: just a few ideas

replies.body: Sounds good, I'm too lazy to notice flaws xD. But, to msg a staff member just do /msg (staff name)
replies.body_tagged: Sounds good, I'm too lazy to notice flaws xD. But, to msg a staff member just do /msg (staff name)

replies.body:
/leaderboards /mleaderboards (match leaderboards) /stats and /mstats (match stats) would be nice
idk bout the kits idea (even tho i just skipped through all of it :333)
and bringing back gamemodes won't be as efficient unless the server is filled up and 
note that the main games that are only being played rn is Nebula, Walls, and CTH
though it would be nice to have skywars and maybe other minigames, but the server
needs more ppl to play in it meaning more advertisement meaning youtubers who actually
record/play on here

replies.body: also /ping and /fix would be great so that when a person is on the floor or lagging, you can /fix [name] so the person's avatar gets fixed back to normal
replies.body_tagged: also /ping and /fix would be great so that when a person is on the floor or lagging, you can /fix [name] so the person's avatar gets fixed back to normal

replies.body: All the kits are way too overpowered
replies.body_tagged: All the kits are way too overpowered
